name: @microsoft/microsoft-graph-client
//: NOTE: The version here should match exactly the exported const PACKAGE_VERSION in common.ts. If you change it here, also change it there.

scripts.rollup-core: node core-browserify.js > lib/graph-js-sdk-core.js && uglifyjs lib/graph-js-sdk-core.js --output lib/graph-js-sdk-core.js
scripts.build-core: npm run compile && npm run rollup-core
scripts.build-with-vendor: npm run compile && npm run rollup-with-vendor
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run rollup-core && npm run rollup-with-vendor
